name: @sugoi/socket
description: sugoi framework socket handler, based on socket.io

scripts.update:patch: rmdir /S dist && tsc && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run docs
scripts.update:minor: rmdir /S dist && tsc && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run docs
scripts.update:major: rmdir /S dist && tsc && npm version major && npm publish && npm run docs

author: Orel Balilti
